name: Anime Zodiac
description:
Hello! There are only three of us here: Capricorn, Leo, and Taurus. The rest of the zodiac signs were ashamed to appear on the page. However, even if they were not ashamed, they would not have enough space here ... But we did not just come for fun, so let's get acquainted!

CHARACTERS



Name: Capricorn
Height: 166 cm
Three sizes: B97 / W58 / H93
Birthday: December 22nd
Element is Earth.
The planet is Saturn, the planet ruling Capricorn. Hence discipline and iron will.
Favorite colors are chocolate, purple.

Restraint and politeness are characteristic of me. I am tactful and always aristocratically reserved, regardless of status or upbringing. My nature dictates a perpetual desire for success. I can show incredible tenacity along the way.


Name: Leo
Height: 178 cm
Three sizes: B104 / W67 / H104
Birthday: August 10
Element - Fire.
The planet is Sun. The Sun strengthens in women of this regal sign dominating qualities: leadership, power, pride, success.
Favorite colors are warm yellow, orange, gold, purple.

Looking at me, I have always attracted the attention of people around me. Like no one else I can charm with uniqueness, beauty, and elegance. In Me, all days are scheduled: a lot of cases, a lot of plans and desires. My confidence combined with a brilliant mind fascinates men. Such as I am not accustomed to receiving men's compliments, to be a general favorite.
Look at me all, I'll let you! Arrr!


Name: Taurus
Height: 170 cm
Three sizes: B120 / W67 / H100
Birthday: April 21
Element - Earth
The planet is Venus, the moon. Venus endows Taurus with magical energy, sensitivity, and a practical attitude to the material world. The Moon is Taurus' second protecting planet. Its influence makes women of this sign romantic and elegant.
Favorite colors are emerald, lemon, and bright blue.

I am woven of contradictions. I have a strange combination of femininity and strength, assertiveness and softness, pragmatism and romanticism. And my shortcomings are easily compensated by advantages, which I always strive to develop.

FEATURES


  • Puzzle game
  • Beautiful artwork
  • Animated characters
  • Relaxing music
  • CG Gallery Mode

    Rotate mosaics to make a picture.
